# ConnectionQualityIndicator

The `ConnectionQualityIndicator` shows the individual connection quality of a participant.

## Import

```typescript
import { ConnectionQualityIndicator } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Usage

```tsx
<ConnectionQualityIndicator />
```
